segments.text: I'm observing the fine details of this interesting line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is undeniably on, and the sink is utterly overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades over the front edge of the basin like a small waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a widening puddle on the floor and cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the 'COOKIE JAR' clearly labeled inside the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stance on the stool seems impossibly precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His grip on the cookie jar and plate appears firm despite the tilt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant gaze and raised hand are very telling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see such waste of water and potential damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the indoor mess and the serene garden outside is quite striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation could really escalate quickly into a bigger problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a bit sick to my stomach to see the water just running out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The domesticity of the scene makes the impending chaos more impactful.
segments.speaker: PAR
